subject: Presidents Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The wind was the major hazard to contend with at Royal Melbourne, and the United States and International teams split six four-ball matches, making the score 7-5 after the first two days of play.
snippet: The wind was the major hazard to contend with at Royal Melbourne, and the United States and International teams split six four-ball matches, making the score 7-5 after the first two days of play.
